# Related Posts Feature

## Implementation
Multi-section related songs component that fetches and displays songs by category.

## Categories Priority
1. **Movie:** - Songs from same movie (highest priority)
2. **Singer:** - More songs by same singer
3. **Lyrics:** / **Lyricist:** - Lyricist's other works
4. **Music:** / **OldMusic:** - Music director's compositions

## Display Rules
- **Posts per section:** 6 songs max
- **Layout:** Responsive grid (1 col mobile → 2 tablet → 3 desktop)
- **Thumbnails:** Show media$thumbnail if available
- **Title:** Display full title from API (including "Lyrics" keyword)
- **Category names:** Replace hyphens with spaces in section headings
- **View All link:** Show when 6+ songs available
- **Current song:** Exclude from all related sections
- **Filter:** Only show posts with Song: or OldSong: categories

## API
```
https://tsonglyricsapp.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default/-/${encodeURIComponent(category)}?alt=json&max-results=${limit + 5}
```
Example: `https://tsonglyricsapp.blogspot.com/feeds/posts/default/-/Movie:Coolie?alt=json&max-results=11`

- Fetch `limit + 5` (11 for 6 needed) to account for filtering
- Cache: 24 hours per category with tag `related-${category}`
- Parallel fetching with Promise.all

## Files
- **Component:** `/components/RelatedSongs.tsx`
- **Integration:** `/app/[slug]/page.tsx` (pass `currentSongId` and `categories`)

## Fallback
If no related songs found in any category, show "Browse All Songs" button linking to home page.
